column5: Just wondering how the fishing has been for bass as of late....i've heard its been a really slow bite...has anyone been getting on em at all out there as of late??? Seems this weather is throwing them off.
I was there two weeks ago in the pouring rain and it was really slow.
I was fishing there on the weekend for walleye and the fish were shut down.  I think it had something to do with the cold front.
I'm going up there for two weeks starting Saturday. They are just waiting for ME to arrive   .
